## DefaultApp.isValid() method

Monitors metadata and other data points as assets are registered and deregistered for app validity.

**Signature:**

```typescript
isValid(context: any): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  context | any | [AppValidityContext](./foundation-shell.appvaliditycontext.md). |

**Returns:**

boolean

A boolean to indicate app validity.
